name: Nightmare
overview: Nightmare is a platform game released in 1986 by K'soft and was later included as a freebie on the B-side of K'soft's re-release of Lunar Attack. You have drifted off to sleep and found yourself in a nightmare. Your objective is to find 6 keys in each of the games 3 platform levels in order to wake yourself. The game is yet another in a long list of Manic Miner clones on the ZX Spectrum
